001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.model.HyperparameterConfigurable;
004
005/**
006 * Marker interface for components that expose a configurable learning rate.
007 */
008public interface EpochConfigurable extends HyperparameterConfigurable {
009
010    /**
011     * The hyperparameter key name for epochs.
012     */
013    String HP_EPOCHS = "epochs";
014
015    /**
016     * Returns the configured number of training epochs.
017     *
018     * @return the number of epochs (must be ≥ 1)
019     */
020    default int getEpochs() {
021        return getHyperparameter(HP_EPOCHS, Integer.class);
022    }
023
024    /**
025     * Sets the number of training epochs.
026     *
027     * @param epochs the number of epochs (must be ≥ 1)
028     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code epochs < 1}
029     */
030    default void setEpochs(int epochs) {
031        if (epochs < 1) {
032            throw new IllegalArgumentException();
033        }
034        setHyperparameter(HP_EPOCHS, epochs);
035    }
036
037}
